text: aur kya aapatti hai ki tum use na khao, jisapar allaah ka naam liya gaya ho, balki jo kuchh cheeze usane tumhaare lie haraam kar dee hai, unako usane vistaarapoorvak tumhe bata diya hai. yah aur baat hai ki usake lie kabhee tumhen vivash hona pade. parantu adhikatar log to gyaan ke bina keval apanee ichchhaon (galat vichaaron) ke dvaara pathabhrashto karate rahate hai. nissandeh tumhaara rab maryaadaaheen logon ko bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai
